Title: Orphans
Plot: Tommy comes to terms with the reality of his broken family as a result of a shocking experience with his father.  When a freak accident occurs, Franco must make a life-changing decision, and Chief Reilly is forced to expose a family secret in order to save his career.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,offensive language,drug use and sex scenes
GuestStars: Patricia Velasquez,  Ned Eisenberg,  Peggy Scott,  Russ Anderson,  Ashley Greiner,  Zoe Alexander,  Stefanie Nava,  Connie Winston,  Shavonne Conroy,  Janet Arneau,  Kevin McCready,  George Hughes,  Jeff Pucillo
